titleStmt.title: Fair-play on both sides: or, the surest way to heaven Discovered in a dispute between a Roman-Catholick, and a Protestant.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Head, at the Heart and Bible in Little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union theological Seminary Library, New York.
